result.title: Study On Technical And Operational Requirements Of Observatory Platform
result.description: New deliverable under WP3 due by month 40 to implement recommendation 4 review report RP1 It is recommended for the committee of experts working on the platform of the Observatory of Southern Tunisian Heritage to produce a relevant study before the technical implementation of the platform The study shall include the technical and operational requirements of the observatorys platform specifying what will be the required operational resources and infrastructures during and after the end of the project grant and how it will be interconnected with the projects web site A new deliverable under Work Package 3 to be submitted by Month 40 shall a summarise the abovementioned study and the platforms implementation and the operation results of the Observatory of Southern Tunisian Heritage b present the sustainability strategy for the technical and operational infrastructures of Observatory of Southern Tunisian Heritage and of the MdHMS after the period of the projects grant

project.title: Cultural heritage in South Tunisia. A twinning project promoting interdisciplinary and participatory sciences for an inclusive society.
